subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Speeches and Statements
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball will honor the anniversary of Lou Gehrig’s farewell at 15 games on Saturday, when his speech will be read during the seventh-inning stretch.
snippet: Major League Baseball will honor the anniversary of Lou Gehrig’s farewell at 15 games on Saturday, when his speech will be read during the seventh-inning stretch.
